backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub containing no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend Valentine's components, utilities, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining build checks, asset path issues, diagnostics logs, and steps for reporting deployment failures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining Valentine's-themed OKLCH color variables and base styles with light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and the root element for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling intro overlay, animations, hero section, surprise reveal, and diagnostics initialization.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates animated floating heart emojis with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/RosePe: Creates animated falling rose petals with randomized motion and a static fallback for reduced‑motion users.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Rotati: Cycles through a list of cute one‑liners with pause‑on‑hover behavior and reduced‑motion detection.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Interactive gift‑reveal component that shows a coupon book and playlist link after activation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useInt: Hook that initializes ambient and confirmation audio, manages mute and first-interaction logic, and provides methods to play sounds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: React component that loads, manages, and cleans up looping background music with mute control and interaction-based autoplay handling.
Intro overlay with audio controls and an evasive 'No' button, triggering ambient audio and a confirmation sound on acceptance.
frontend/src/deployDiagnostics.ts: Diagnostics module that logs environment details, tracks resource load errors, global errors, unhandled rejections, and page lifecycle events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state, exposing identity, login/clear actions, and login status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables, and Valentine-themed colors plus custom components like valentine-card and valentine-badge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/assetBase.ts: Provides a helper to build correct asset URLs using Vite's BASE_URL, ensuring SPA compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color tokens, Valentine palette, fonts, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine’s website build.
